<h3 id="X31501">X(31501) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {CIRCUMCIRCLE, INCIRCLE, NINE-POINTS, MOSES}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31501) lies on these lines:
{2,1500}, {3,9650}, {5,9664}, {12,574}, {32,5432}, {35,5475}, {39,498}, {55,1506}, {115,31448}, {140,2242}, {187,9596}, {496,3055}, {615,31471}, {631,31409}, {1015,3085}, {1479,7603}, {1505,9646}, {1571,5219}, {1573,5552}, {1656,31477}, {2241,3815}, {2275,3584}, {2276,7746}, {2548,5218}, {2549,10588}, {3295,31489}, {3526,31478}, {3788,27020}, {4294,31415}, {4299,8589}, {5013,31479}, {5217,7747}, {5281,31404}, {5283,27529}, {5414,31481}, {5687,31488}, {7354,15515}, {7748,7951}, {7756,10895}, {7862,26590}, {8227,31433}, {9341,21843}, {9561,31496}, {9599,31452}, {9612,31422}, {9619,31434}, {9654,15815}, {9675,31499}, {9685,31500}, {10197,16604}, {13411,31398}, {13881,31461}, {15482,26561}, {16589,26364}, {16781,31467}, {17757,31456}</p>
<p>
X(31501) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 31476, 9650), (5, 31451, 9664)<br>
